entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
